attraction_knownFor: "“ Perfect for a Family ” Reviewed March 17, 2012 What is fantastic about River Park is its safety. There are only two entrances to this little community, which is situated right next to the beautiful American River. All homes are within walking distance of Glen Hall park, which is a great place to walk on the levee, enjoy the community pool, and watch your children play soccer. In addition,...
